extension.summary: A bundle of system tools and programs
extension.description: This bundle currently includes 7-zip, autossh, bottom, diffutils, dstat, dtach, efibootmgr, encfs, evtest, fdupes, file, getscancodes, hddtemp, hd-idle, hid_mapper, htop, i2c-tools, inotify-tools, jq, libgpiod, lm_sensors, lshw, mc, mmc-utils, mtpfs, nmon, patch, pv, screen, smartmontools, stress-ng, unrar, usb-modeswitch and vim.
